 java.lang.String[] get_hashalgo()
           Type of hashing algorithm.
Default value: HMAC_SHA256
Possible values = HMAC_SHA1, HMAC_SHA256, HMAC_SHA384, HMAC_SHA512, HMAC_MD5

           Lifetime of SA in seconds.
Minimum value = 60
Maximum value = 31536000
 java.lang.Long get_livenesscheckinterval()
           Number of seconds after which a notify payload is sent to check the liveliness of the peer.
 java.lang.Long get_retransmissiontime()
           The interval in seconds to retry sending the IKE messages to peer, three consecutive attempts are done with doubled interval after every failure., increases for every retransmit till 6 retransmits.

set_livenesscheckinterval

public void set_livenesscheckinterval(long livenesscheckinterval)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
 Number of seconds after which a notify payload is sent to check the liveliness of the peer. Additional retries are done as per retransmit interval setting. Zero value disables liveliness checks.
 Minimum value =  0
 Maximum value =  64999

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

set_livenesscheckinterval

public void set_livenesscheckinterval(java.lang.Long livenesscheckinterval)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
 Number of seconds after which a notify payload is sent to check the liveliness of the peer. Additional retries are done as per retransmit interval setting. Zero value disables liveliness checks.
 Minimum value =  0
 Maximum value =  64999

set_retransmissiontime

public void set_retransmissiontime(long retransmissiontime)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
 The interval in seconds to retry sending the IKE messages to peer, three consecutive attempts are done with doubled interval after every failure.,
increases for every retransmit till 6 retransmits. .
 Minimum value =  1
 Maximum value =  99
